snippet.title: The American Dream Teaser
snippet.description:
Avaliable Now!! 
Steam - http://store.steampowered.com/app/456180/The_American_Dream/
PlayStation Store US: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP3310-CUSA09692_00-0123012301234567
PlayStation Store EU: https://store.playstation.com/en-gb/product/EP3170-CUSA07971_00-0123012301234567
Oculus - https://www.oculus.com/experiences/rift/1551845794893427/


Samurai Punk presents The American Dream. Look down the barrel of a future where all your everyday needs are solved with guns. 

Follow development at https://twitter.com/samuraipunkco
